full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 751 Filed 08/10/22 Page 208 of 261 1369 LC6VMAX6 Maguire - direct 1 So this particular staircase started on the second floor and connected to the third and possibly the fourth floor. 2 Q. Did there come a time when you and the search team went to 3 the third floor of the residence? 4 A. Yes, we did. 5 Q. I want to ask you some questions about the third floor of 6 the residence. 7 8 Did you come across a room within the residence that 9 you would describe as a massage room? 10 A. Yes, I did. 11 Q. I want to ask you about that room. 12 MS. MODE: Ms. Drescher, if you could please show the 13 witness, the Court, and counsel what's been marked for 14 identification as Government Exhibit 902-R. Thank you. 15 Q. Special Agent Maguire, do you recognize Government Exhibit 16 902-R? 17 A. Yes, I do. 18 Q. And what is that exhibit? 19 A. This is a photograph of the entryway into the massage room 20 on the third floor. 21 Q. Is this a fair and accurate depiction of the entryway into 22 the massage room? 23 A. Yes, it is. 24 MS. MODE: Your Honor, the government offers Government 25 Exhibit 902-R. SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00012959
